items.summary: Replace the current Family Chat app primary flow (chat + family settings views) with a minimal “New App” placeholder experience that clearly indicates this is a fresh app starting point, since the user requested creating a new app. The placeholder must be accessible after Internet Identity sign-in and should not expose the existing chat or family settings screens from the main navigation.

Add a simple “What do you want to build?” input area on the “New App” placeholder screen to capture the user’s intended new app description locally (client-side state only), with a prominent call-to-action to continue (no backend persistence required).
